osyfe.graphic

Class Framebuffer.Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.Framebuffer.Config
  • Enclosing class:
    Framebuffer

    public static class Framebuffer.Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents framebuffer configuration options.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Config() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Framebuffer.Config alpha(boolean enable)
      Enables/disables the alpha channel (default: false).
      Framebuffer.Config border_color(float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Specifies the border color.
      Framebuffer.Config color_16_bits()
      Sets 16 bit resolution per color channel (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config color_32_bits()
      Sets 32 bit resolution per color channel.
      Framebuffer.Config colors(int colors)
      Number of color components (default: 1).
      Framebuffer.Config depth_16_bits()
      Sets 16 bit resolution for the depth channel.
      Framebuffer.Config depth_32_bits_floating()
      Sets 32 bit floating resolution for the depth channel.
      Framebuffer.Config depth_32_bits()
      Sets 32 bit resolution for the depth channel (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config depth(boolean depth)
      Enables/disables a sampleable depth buffer (default: true).
      Framebuffer.Config filter_linear()
      Linear texture zooming (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture zooming.
      Framebuffer.Config height(int height)
      Height of the framebuffer (default: Screen.height()).
      Framebuffer.Config mag_filter_linear()
      Linear texture in zooming (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config mag_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture in zooming.
      Framebuffer.Config min_filter_linear()
      Linear texture out zooming (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config min_filter_nearest()
      Rounded texture out zooming.
      Framebuffer.Config screenSize()
      Set width and height of the framebuffer to the screen size (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config size(int width, int height)
      Width and height of the framebuffer (default: (Screen.width(), Screen.height())).
      Framebuffer.Config width(int width)
      Width of the framebuffer (default: Screen.width()).
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_clamp_to_border()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the specified border color.
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_clamp_to_border(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the specified border color.
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_clamp_to_edge()
      Texture coordinates are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_clamp_to_edge(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are clamped to the edge color (the default).
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_mirrored_reapeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated mirrored.
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_mirrored_reapeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated mirrored.
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_repeat()
      Texture coordinates are repeated.
      Framebuffer.Config wrap_repeat(int axis)
      Texture coordinates for the given axis (0 or 1) are repeated.
